person.note: Zhang(1) Fangping [217] His ancestors were Qinghe jun Zhang(1) and were powerful in Songzhou from the late Tang through the Five Dynasties. His grandfather was a 980 jinshi. His father, alone, did not take office, but sustained the family's economic position. Fangping was Ma(2)'s Jiang [7056] son-in-law, Cai(1) Tianshen's [1660] and Wang(2) Gong's [7084] father-in-law. His maternal grandfather was Ji(11) Ying [7019]. Cai(1) Ting's [1661] son, Xiu [3858], was the husband of Fangping's sister. Zhang Fangping, WJ, 40.1a, 'fu,' 1a. Su Shi, WJ, 'houji,' 17.637-38, 645. XCB, 159.11b, 183.12a, 189.7a. CBD, 3, 2349-51.
